objects.description: [Magic Hound](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0059) malware has used base64-encoded files and has also encrypted embedded strings with AES.(Citation: Unit 42 Magic Hound Feb 2017)(Citation: Microsoft Iranian Threat Actor Trends November 2021)
